Ongoing projects

InterConnect

EU H2020

Interoperable Solutions Connecting Smart Homes, Buildings and Grids

CloudDBAppliance

EU H2020

European Cloud Database Appliance for providing a Database as a Service able to match the predictable performance, robustness and trustworthiness of on premise architectures such as those based on mainframes.

InteGrid

EU H2020

InteGrid’s vision is to bridge the gap between citizens and technology/solution providers such as utilities, aggregators, manufacturers and all other agents providing energy services

Past projects

Accelerated Object Stores

JSA IBM

Middleware system that is able to efficiently handle data from document-based repositories.

SafeCloud

EU H2020

Secure and Resilient Cloud Architecture

LeanBigData

EU FP7

Ultra-scalable and ultra-efficient integrated big data platform addressing important open issues in big data analytics

CoherentPaaS

EU FP7

Coherent and rich PaaS with a common programming model.

Accelerated Object Stores

JSA IBM

Middleware system that is able to efficiently handle data from document-based repositories.

CumuloNimbo

EU FP7

A Highly Scalable Transactional Multi-Tier Platform as a Service

CC - Cloud Computing em Data Centers

Industry PT Inovação (Now Altice Labs)

Study the viability of using NoSQL databases as complementary solutions to traditional relational database management systems to achieve scalability and elasticity in telecom applications.

Stratus

National FCT

A Layered Approach to Data Management in the Cloud

ReD, Resilient databases

National FCT

Generic, robust, and inexpensive shared-storage cluster from an off-the-shelf RDBMS.

GORDA

EU FP6

Fostering database replication by standardizing architecture and interfaces, and by sparking their usage with a comprehensive set of open components ready to be deployed.

RADicalize: Rapid Application Delivery for the Modern Enterprise Project code

National Portugal 2020 OutSystems

Research into how to enable developers using a low code platform to interact with different NoSQL data sources through the platform’s unified visual query model, leveraging polyglot systems for this goal.

We are part of the High-Assurance Software Laboratory, one of the integrated R&D centres of INESC TEC and a subunit of University of Minho.
